Billlie

Introduction

Sheon is a South Korean dancer, rapper, and singer signed under MYSTIC Story. She is a member of the girl group Billlie.

Sheon was introduced as a trainee on March 7, 2019, as part of a group called ISE, which later became bugAboo. She left both ISE and the company, A Team Entertainment, around mid-2020.

In 2021, under her full name Kim Suyeon, she participated in the survival show "Girls Planet 999," where she was eliminated after ranking 10th in the final, narrowly missing the opportunity to debut.

On November 19, 2021, it was announced that Sheon would be joining Billlie, which had debuted earlier that month. She performed with the group for the first time on November 27, 2021, on "Show! Music Core." Sheon officially debuted with Billlie on December 14, 2021, with the release of "The Collective Soul and Unconscious: Snowy Night."
